org.sql: SELECT conversation_mutes.conversation_id FROM conversation_mutes WHERE conversation_mutes.conversation_id IN ("$1", "$2") AND conversation_mutes.account_id = "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT conversation_mutes.conversation_id FROM conversation_mutes WHERE conversation_mutes.conversation_id IN ("$1", "$2") AND conversation_mutes.account_id = "$3" LIMIT 1
